last_episode_to_air.name: Dogwood-Azalea (Missouri) (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Azalea is excited about her new friend, Lucy. But when Lucy says she wants to be friends forever...she really means forever.

name: 50 States of Fright
overview: A horror anthology series based on urban legends that takes viewers deeper into the horrors that lurk just beneath the surface of America.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The first season will explore stories based on urban legends from Colorado, Florida, Iowa, Kansas, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, Oregon and Washington.

episodes.name: The Golden Arm (Michigan) (1)
episodes.overview: Two lovebirds. One awful accident. Heather offers Dave a helping hand. Too bad she may never see that hand again.

episodes.name: The Golden Arm (Michigan) (2)
episodes.overview: Upset. Disfigured. Obsessed with her beauty. Heather insists on an arm replacement made of gold. But it comes at a cost.

episodes.name: The Golden Arm (Michigan) (3)
episodes.overview: Dave goes against Heather’s last wish to get out of debt. But when you break a promise, the fallout can be deadly.

episodes.name: Ball of Twine (Kansas) (1)
episodes.overview: A mother and daughter stop to see the world’s largest ball of twine. It may sound boring, but it really draws the daughter in.

episodes.name: Ball of Twine (Kansas) (2)
episodes.overview: Susan turns to the cops to help find Amelia. Turns out, the town is wound up in something much darker than suspected.

episodes.name: Ball of Twine (Kansas) (3)
episodes.overview: It’s time to get to the center of the conspiracy. Susan digs in deep in an attempt to pull Amelia out of danger.

episodes.name: Scared Stiff (Oregon) (1)
episodes.overview: Sebastian Klempner was a taxidermy legend. But after accepting a job for a strange animal, his greatest masterpiece may just be his greatest mistake.

episodes.name: Scared Stiff (Oregon) (2)
episodes.overview: A knock at the door brings an unexpected visitor. And they are very unhappy with Sebastian’s work. So much so, it just might cost him his life.

episodes.name: Grey Cloud Island (Minnesota) (1)
episodes.overview: Four pledges are ready to find out if they’re Kappa material. But this initiation ritual is about to get way darker than they expected.

episodes.name: Grey Cloud Island (Minnesota) (2)
episodes.overview: The pledges free a chained victim and attempt to find help in the woods. Can they trust that whoever they find will be on their side?

episodes.name: Grey Cloud Island (Minnesota) (3)
episodes.overview: This is no frat initiation. The remaining pledges fight to stay alive as the Grey Cloud villagers all begin to close in.

episodes.name: Destino (Florida) (1)
episodes.overview: Miami police respond to an odd call about a stolen goat. Their body cams and video surveillance reveal what happens when they arrive at the scene.

episodes.name: Destino (Florida) (2)
episodes.overview: Backup arrives at the scene to investigate the missing officers. What they find is horrifying. But for Vasquez, it’s also personal.

episodes.name: Destino (Florida) (3)
episodes.overview: The officers interrupt an ancient ritual. Vasquez fights to keep her partners alive but evil’s grasp is a hard one to break.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The first season will explore stories based on urban legends from Colorado, Florida, Iowa, Kansas, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, Oregon and Washington.

episodes.name: Almost There (Iowa) (1)
episodes.overview: Hannah has a past life. A past trauma. And a terrible fear of heights. Now, one late-night call brings her back to where it all began.

episodes.name: Almost There (Iowa) (2)
episodes.overview: Hannah and Blake start their climb up the turbine. She just has to remember to go one step at a time. And never look down.

episodes.name: Almost There (Iowa) (3)
episodes.overview: It’s a race to the top as the lights go out. Can Hannah climb to the engine in time? Or will her past catch up with her?

episodes.name: 13 Steps to Hell (Washington) (1)
episodes.overview: When Mallory and her brothers go to the town cemetery to bury their pet, they dig up something much darker than dirt.

episodes.name: 13 Steps to Hell (Washington) (2)
episodes.overview: Mallory moves down the underground staircase to rescue Aiden’s toy. But what she discovers down there is far more frightening than the dark.

episodes.name: Red Rum (Colorado) (1)
episodes.overview: A group of ghost-debunking friends visit the haunted Stanley Hotel. When Kyle sneaks down to explore the basement tunnels, the results are life-shattering.

episodes.name: Red Rum (Colorado) (2)
episodes.overview: The phone-obsessed friends grab a drink at the hotel bar. But when Logan heads up to her room, she realizes another guest has checked in.

episodes.name: Red Rum (Colorado) (3)
episodes.overview: Now all alone, Simon wanders the hotel halls looking for his friends. But what he finds instead is far from friendly.

episodes.name: Dogwood-Azalea (Missouri) (1)
episodes.overview: Azalea and her parents arrive at their new home. All seems well, until she discovers a doll in the cemetery next door.

episodes.name: Dogwood-Azalea (Missouri) (2)
episodes.overview: Azalea is excited about her new friend, Lucy. But when Lucy says she wants to be friends forever...she really means forever.
